RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the front seat of the truck cab: front seat of the truck cab

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas: location where the pickup truck was stopped, approximately 115 miles north of the Mexican border
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexican border: reference point for the location of the stop, 115 miles south of where the pickup truck was stopped
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Interstate Highway: highway where the pickup truck was stopped, in Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.front seat of the truck cab: part of the truck where three women were seated
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.back seat of the truck: rear part of the truck cab where five or six men were seated
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.pickup truck: vehicle stopped on an Interstate Highway in Texas, containing a heavily loaded camper attachment
